Sensory Board: Mount a keyboard on a large surface to create a tactile feedback system for visually impaired individuals, enabling them to interact with digital interfaces solely through touch.
Desk Plant Holder: Transform a keyboard into a planter for growing small plants and flowers, combining form and function in a minimalist display.
Interactive Installation: Place a keyboard beneath a transparent surface, allowing passersby to interact with it, adding an element of surprise and engagement to public installations.
DIY Wind Chimes: Attach metal elements from a keyboard to a stick to create an innovative, musical wind chime setup that can be customized to display favorite melodies.
Wall-Mount Display: Attach keys to a board for use as a unique, customizable wall art piece, bringing attention to the visual appeal of an unused keyboard.
